properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 c1 c1 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines: When Jesus went to Jerusalem town,

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: The crowd rose up with a mighty sound.

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines: They lifted their voices in one accord,

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines: Here comes the King in the name of the Lord.

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines: The Pharisees cried Master do you hear,

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines: The crowd is shouting that Jehovah is here.

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines: Rebuke this people for their ignorance now,

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines: But Jesus said, No, NO!

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines: If they hold their peace then

verse.name: v1j
verse.lines: The rocks will cry out,

verse.name: v1k
verse.lines: The rocks will cry out.

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
If we do not sing then
the rocks will cry out,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
If we do not praise then
the mountains will shout.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
The earth will shake,
the trees will bow,

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
We can’t be silent or
the rocks will cry out.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines: Creation sings of the glory of God,

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines: The ocean thunders in wild applause.

verse.name: v2c
verse.lines: The lily’s sweet bloom and the sparrows song,

verse.name: v2d
verse.lines: Joining the praise that goes on and on.

verse.name: v2e
verse.lines: His majesty speaks from the forest tall,

verse.name: v2f
verse.lines: His splendour calls out in the water fall.

verse.name: v2g
verse.lines: Behold His glory all of natures shout,

verse.name: v2h
verse.lines: And if we don't sing______sing!

verse.name: v2i
verse.lines: If we hold our peace then

verse.name: v2j
verse.lines:
The rocks will cry out.
The rocks will cry out!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines: If we do not sing then the rocks will cry out

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
If we do not praise then
the mountains will shout.

verse.name: v3c
verse.lines: We can’t be silent or the rocks will cry out.

verse.name: v3d
verse.lines: We can't be silent,,

verse.name: v3e
verse.lines: We won't be silent,,

verse.name: v3f
verse.lines:
We'll never be silent or
The Rocks will cryout!
